{{Description|A certain lady from [[Sumeru]] has come all this way to [[Liyue]] to conduct a certain brand of research. Help her complete this research, and fine rewards shall be yours...}}
'''Spices From the West''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 2.6]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2022/05/14 10:00 – 2022/06/07 03:59

===Requirements===
* Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above to create seasonings.
* Reach Adventure Rank 28 or above and complete the quest "[[Idle Teapot Talk]]" to cook the corresponding dishes and invite [[characters]] to taste-test.

===Summary===
* Complete [[A Visitor From Westward Realms]] to take part in the event.
* During the event, help [[Nazafarin]] conduct her research by making seasonings according to the recipes provided to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Weapon Ascension Materials]], and [[Mora]].
* A new seasoning recipe will unlock on each of the first 7 days of the event. Follow the recipes to create "Fragrant Seasonings" and obtain corresponding rewards.
* Add the Fragrant Seasonings to Delicious dishes to obtain Fragrant dishes. You can invite characters to taste-test the Fragrant Dishes in your [[Serenitea Pot]] to increase their [[Companionship EXP]] and also hear their responses, which will vary based on the character's personal preferences. There is a limit on the number of times you can get Companionship EXP during the event.
** For each Fragrant Dish you share with a character, that respective character will gain 100 Companionship EXP.
** There are 21 opportunities to increase a character's Companionship EXP, with three unlocked with each recipe.
** Feeding a character already at Friendship Level 10 will not count towards the 21 opportunity limit.
* Reach Adventure Rank 28 and complete the "[[A Teapot to Call Home]]" quest to unlock the Serenitea Pot. You can accept the "Idle Teapot Talk" quest from Tubby in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. After completing the quest and obtaining "Realm Dispatch," you can cook the food and invite characters to sample it.
* If the maintenance of Serenitea Pot Placement Function has ended during the event, Travelers can invite companions who are resting to stay in Serenitea Pot and invite characters to try out food.
* After 2022/06/07 03:59:59, "Fragrant Seasonings" and "Fragrant Dishes" will be removed from your [[Inventory]].

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Spices From the West 1.png
|text1 = During the event, Travelers can utilize recipes that they unlock to create seasonings before adding these seasonings to "Delicious" dishes to obtain "Fragrant" dishes. Invite characters in your Serenitea Pot to try these Fragrant dishes out to increase their Companionship EXP and also receive different reactions from them based on their tastes.
|image2 = Tutorial Spices From the West 2.png
|text2 = When you begin making the seasonings, the needle on the slider will move back and forth from edge to edge. Follow the instructions given on the recipe and click the button as the needle points to the corresponding ingredient to add them to the pot.
|image3 = Tutorial Spices From the West 3.png
|text3 = The number of Click attempts you can make will decrease by 1 each time the needle reaches both ends, or when you make a mistake in adding an ingredient. Add the correct number of ingredients before you use up all your attempts and you will succeed, or this seasoning-making attempt shall be considered a failure.
|image4 = Tutorial Spices From the West 4.png
|text4 = The ingredients needed for this recipe can be found {{Color|Menu|in the wild}}, purchased at {{Color|Menu|general stores}} or at {{Color|Menu|Bubu Pharmacy}}, or via other methods.
|image5 = Tutorial Spices From the West 5.png
|text5 = Unlock the Serenitea Pot and complete the Idle Teapot Talk quest to invite characters into your Serenitea Pot to try your food. When they try your food, characters' Companionship EXP will increase, and they will also give comments based on their individual tastes.
}}

===Character Preferences===
{{See also|Spices From the West/Voice-Overs}}
Travelers may invite characters to taste-test the Fragrant Dishes in their Serenitea Pot to increase their Companionship EXP. The characters' personal preferences vary, and they respond with different voice-overs and visual effects depending on how much they like what they are given.

For brevity and convenience, all reactions are considered to be ''Like'', ''Neutral'', or ''Dislike''. Any dish not listed in a character's row garners a ''Neutral'' reaction from that character.<!-- TABLE IS COMPLETE; if you find any discrepancies, please include footage/evidence; please check the Voice-Overs tab to see the voice-overs for each reaction -->

==Trivia==
* This event was planned to be released in Phase 2 of [[Version 2.6]], but due to [[Version/2.6#Serenitea Pot Maintenance|Serenitea Pot maintenance]] and the delay of [[Version 2.7]], it was postponed to a new Phase 3.
* This event starts and ends in two different Versions (Version 2.6 and Version 2.7). It is the first limited-time non-mail in-game event to do so. It is also the second limited-time in-game event to do so, the first being [["Savior From Another World" Aloy]], which started in [[Version 2.1]] and ended in [[Version 2.2]].
* Fragrant dishes can be given to all characters released before or during the event, except for [[Aloy]].
